pkgmetadata.longdescription: Read 'Bibtex' Files and Convert Between Bibliography Formats // Read and write 'Bibtex' files. Convert between bibliography formats, including 'Bibtex', 'Biblatex', 'Endnote', and 'Bibentry'. Includes a port of the 'bibutils' utilities by Chris Putnam https://sourceforge.net/projects/bibutils/. Supports all bibliography formats and character encodings implemented in 'bibutils'.
